title: How do I manage my Pearson content and tools from Blackboard?
content:
Use the Pearson tools page to:

  • Access Pearson content.
  • Manage the Pearson student roster.
  • Refresh Pearson grades in the Blackboard Grade Center.
  • View and export information to provide Pearson Support to troubleshoot issues.
  • View Pearson Help & Support for Blackboard.
